subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Hélio Castroneves held off Scott Dixon to win the inaugural Indy Grand Prix of Alabama on Sunday in Birmingham, coasting to the finish line over the final two laps after a late caution period.
snippet: Hélio Castroneves held off Scott Dixon to win the inaugural Indy Grand Prix of Alabama on Sunday in Birmingham, coasting to the finish line over the final two laps after a late caution period.
